Detailed Description

One wire bus driver.

Author:
M. P. Hayes, UCECE
Date:
08 June 2002
Note:
This interface only supports the one bus but with multiple devices on the bus. This was a deliberate choice that I may regret one day. It keeps the interface simpler, reduces the code size, and most systems will only ever have a single one wire bus. To support multiple one wire buses then run-time configuration will need to be passed as an additional argument to u1wire_init.
